'''Collected Miscellany''' are videos released by official Genshin Impact media that demonstrate and explain characters' skills in the game. They are usually narrated by [[Dainsleif]], with the exception of [[Aloy]], [[Dori]], and [[Wanderer]]'s videos, which were narrated by [[Alice]] instead.
